attributes.action: ensure that all ballot boxes are made of heavy metal and securely locked.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under no circumstances should ballot boxes be made of cardboard or any other material that could be easily tampered with.  The metal ballot boxes should remain locked and sealed until it is time for the votes to be counted.  This applies to all elections general, council, Eu

rejection.details: Please contact the Electoral Commission with your suggestion.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
